actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Elections.

official_title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit any multicandidate political committee that is controlled by a Member of the House of Representatives from making contributions to any other individual who is a candidate for the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit a multicandidate political committee controlled by a Member of the House of Representatives from making contributions to an authorized committee of any other individual who is a candidate for the House of Representatives.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit any multicandidate political committee that is controlled by a Member of the House of Representatives from making contributions to any other individual who is a candidate for the House of Representatives.
